item.description:
Lets party!
I have reserved a private room for us at the Village Smokehouse for some Texan BBQ! Dinner will be buffet style and the menu is "Choose (3) from chicken, beef ribs, pork ribs, pulled pork, sausage, and brisket. Includes salad, cole slaw, beans and cornbread. Additional side orders may be ordered for $1.95 per person. Choose from rice, potato salad, baked potato homemade mashed potatoes, french fries or corn on the cob. Full Bar Air Conditioned Function Room. $18.95 per person" ($23.31 with tax & tip - CASH ONLY)
After dinner we can move the tables aside and do some dancing! They have satelite radio and we can bring CDs to give to the bartender to play - so bring your favorite dance music! The room is free if we have 35 people, so I am shooting for 45.

www.villagesmokehouse.com
item.name: Dinner & Dance Party
